metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38091 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter16_sobel in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra60 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec60 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavdevice60 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra9 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter9 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra60 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat60 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavutil58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libpostproc57 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswresample4 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswscale7 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ebarretto> ffmpeg: same fix as CVE-2020-20898

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
